name: Craftcoin
tagline: A CryptoCurrency specifically for games that require you to mine and craft.
body:
### Welcome to CraftCoin.
This is a fork of Bitcoin, and is designed for use in games that allow you to mine and craft.  I've even heard that there is a game that uses those two specific words in the title.

More information will come as we build.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2016, Chris Robock (@crobock) created CraftCoin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
